   ThreatTrace - Quick Logo Setup Guide
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

ğŸ“ WHERE TO PUT YOUR LOGOS:

1. Full Logo (with text):
   â””â”€ ThreatTrace/frontend/public/images/logos/logo-full.png
   
2. Icon Logo (symbol only):
   â””â”€ ThreatTrace/frontend/public/images/logos/logo-icon.png

3. Background Image (optional):
   â””â”€ ThreatTrace/frontend/public/images/backgrounds/auth-bg.jpg


ğŸ“ RECOMMENDED SIZES:

â€¢ Full Logo:  200x50px to 400x100px (PNG or SVG)
â€¢ Icon Logo:  64x64px to 128x128px (PNG or SVG)
â€¢ Background: 1920x1080px (JPG)


ğŸ¨ WHERE LOGOS WILL APPEAR:

âœ“ Login page - Center top (Full Logo)
âœ“ Signup page - Center top (Full Logo)
âœ“ Sidebar expanded - Top left (Full Logo)
âœ“ Sidebar collapsed - Top left (Icon Logo)


âš¡ QUICK STEPS:

1. Prepare your logo files
2. Name them: logo-full.png and logo-icon.png
3. Copy to: frontend/public/images/logos/
4. Refresh browser - Done! âœ¨


ğŸ’¡ NO LOGO YET?

Don't worry! The app shows a professional placeholder:
â€¢ Gradient shield icon
â€¢ "ThreatTrace" text with cyber styling
â€¢ Looks great until you add your own logo


ğŸ”§ NEED HELP?
